issue.title: Switch to nostrdb subscriptions
issue.body: There is an issue where you don't get the parsed note right away. This is because the current version of notecrumbs is using an older version of nostrdb without subscriptions.

comment.body:
It's a bit more complicated than this when it comes to arabic. Arabic
requires proper text shaping (right-to-left text). This is currently not
supported by egui.

https://github.com/emilk/egui/issues/56

issue.title: Notecrumbs long form note design
issue.body: Should notecrumbs render long form notes differently than kind1s?

issue.title: Preview image, instead of displaying alphanumeric URL
issue.body:
To make notecrumbs more palatable to the human eye, consider previewing images

example nevent with URL 

https://github.com/damus-io/notecrumbs/issues/2#issuecomment-1922017106

comment.body:
On Thu, Feb 01, 2024 at 10:57:38AM -0800, alltheseas wrote:
>To make notecrumbs more palatable to the human eye, consider previewing images

would be easy to add! lots of quality of life improvements soon, like
actually loading profiles.

issue.title: Notecrumbs initial rendering broken. Brave browser
issue.body:
_what happens_

Text overflows on initial load. Fixes on refresh.

Brave 1.61.120
MacOS 13.6.3

Issue recreated on iOS brave browser. 

https://damus.io/note1us8pgca6zgvufxramm07cukte4vhw06eu0jst6hud5tjecn3ehvqryhd0p

![image](https://github.com/damus-io/notecrumbs/assets/64376233/67ab12c8-17ca-4b9f-ae48-f39ed45f8274)

Migrated from

https://github.com/damus-io/damus/issues/1925
